name: template2jsx
description: Stop transpiling React components for Node with JSX templates, which use native es6 tagged template literals

scripts.es6ify: echo 'let window = {};' > dist/index.min.es.js && cat dist/index.min.js >> dist/index.min.es.js && echo 'export const {getJSXTag} = window.template2jsx;' >> dist/index.min.es.js
scripts.start: npm run bundle && npm run minify && npm run es6ify

author: Vance Lucas <vance@vancelucas.com>
